com.pump.plaf

Class DoubleClickListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • com.pump.plaf.DoubleClickListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DoubleClickListener
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    When a double-click is detected, this puts a Runnable on the EDT queue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.Runnable runnable 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoubleClickListener(javax.swing.AbstractButton button)
      When a double-click is observed a button is clicked.
      DoubleClickListener(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      When a double-click is observed the argument Runnable is put on the EDT.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoubleClickListener

        public DoubleClickListener(javax.swing.AbstractButton button)
        When a double-click is observed a button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        button - when a double-click is observed this button's doClick() method is invoked if it is enabled.

      • DoubleClickListener

        public DoubleClickListener(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        When a double-click is observed the argument Runnable is put on the EDT.
        Parameters:
        runnable - a runnable to put in the EDT when a double-click is observed.
